comment.author: 61614891@N06
comment._content: Inside the small terminal, a small band (Mexican, if I recall correctly) was playing on opening day of service.  Despite a great deal of advertising, this airline never got more than a miniscule ridership on its San Diego/Montogermy to LAX route, importantly because it had no or almost no interline rates.  I. E. Quastler photo and comment.
